description:
Sets a reminder for one-time or repeated execution at the date/time specified.

Repetition types: Annually, Monthly, Weekly, Daily
.    - Note: Repeating reminders will not send if set for a day that does not occur in the month/year

Year - The year to first run the reminder

Month (1-12) - The month to first run the reminder

Day Of Month (1-31) - The day to first run the reminder

Day of Week (Monday-Sunday) - The day to first run the reminder

Time (12 or 24 hour) - The time to run the reminder
.    - Supports any combination of hours/minutes/seconds. E.g: 12PM, 12:00PM, or 12:00:00PM
